category.name: index
category.entry: Stars Under Attack (S-U-A) is a browser game written in <abbr title="Hypertext Preprocessor">PHP 5</abbr>. The main goal of this project is to be more user friendly than other games of this kind by following the <abbr title="World Wide Web Consortium">W3C</abbr> <abbr title="Web Accessibility Initiative">WAI</abbr> guidelines. It uses valid <abbr title="Extensible Markup Language">XHTML</abbr> 1.0 and tries to be flexibly changable using <abbr title="Cascading Stylesheets">CSS</abbr>. Users have got many settings to use the game according to their preferences and available software.
The game developers’ chat is available on #%2$s on %1$s. You can meet a developer there nearly at every time of day.
In our mailing list, you can discuss new features or report bugs that you’re not sure about. Modern mail clients support threaded view, so the mailing list replaces a forum.
The requested action has been performed successfully.

category.name: download
category.entry: S-U-A uses SVN for version control. See below where to find our repository. If you haven’t got a SVN client, you can also access our repository via the WebSVN interface. Every version is also packed and available as a .tar.bz2 archive.

Our SVN repository can be found on %1$s. Please mind that the developers also use this repository to exchange current, untested changes. It might be that the version from our SVN trunk doesn’t work at all.
If your browser doesn’t support SVN, or you just want see a file or compare two versions, the WebSVN interface is available via HTTP.

Each time a tag in our SVN repository is created, the content of the trunk is also packed into a .tar.bz2 archive. You can download these archives here, but please mind that such a package might not contain the newest bug fixes.

category.name: bugs

category.name: skins
category.entry: Here you will find several <abbr title="Stars Under Attack">S-U-A</abbr> skins for download. Feel free to edit them as much as you desire.
